attributes.action: Make 12th July a bank holiday to commemorate England’s footballing excellence
attributes.additional_details: Making 12th July a bank holiday will allow every England person to enjoy the Sunday euro finals to the maximum extent with loved ones. The day off will also help commemorate the excellent performance of England in their Euro 2020 stint
attributes.background: Making 12th July a bank holiday will allow every England person to enjoy the Sunday euro finals to the maximum extent with loved ones. The day off will also help commemorate the excellent performance of England in their Euro 2020 stint

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
